Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the involvement of ANTIFA and BLM anarchists in the plot to kidnap Gov. Gretchen Whitmer. There is no evidence to support this assertion.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the perpetrators were ANTIFA and BLM anarchists.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the suspects' affiliation with Black Lives Matter and antifa is relevant to the kidnapping plot, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim, which is that the suspects were members of an anti-government group known as the Wolverine Watchmen, as stated by federal and state officials.
